s.text: and sometimes he would just make a racket until you came and got him and one night we'd forgotten to put water out for him and and Hal and i were in bed and all of a sudden there was all this noise out to the side the house and and he'd pick up his dish and throw it in the air
i forgot to ask you did the iguana catch flies for you

okay these are cats i remember one time uh i used to get a chuckle out of out of Pogo that dates me quite a bit you probably don't know Pogo
